<section class="descriptionSection js-viewAnalyticsSection mortar-wrapper" id="descriptionSection" data-analytics-name="about" style="margin-top:1.875rem">

We are now accepting in-person tours via scheduled appointments only. Our virtual tours are also available. Please schedule yours today. Start your journey at The Franklin at Crossroads apartments in Cary, NC. The Franklin brings modern, luxury apartment living to one of the most dynamic and active areas of Cary. Located just minutes outside of SW Raleigh, North Carolina, the Franklin at Crossroads Apartments provides easy and convenient road access to great shopping like Crossroads Plaza and major employers like Epic Games, Relias Learning, and Siemens Medical Solutions. The Franklin at Crossroads apartments offers one, two, and three bedroom floor plans are designed to wrap you in elegant sophistication. Our distinct apartment homes feature wide plank flooring, chef-inspired kitchen islands with chic pendant lighting, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances. Enjoy luxury apartments that can accommodate your every need.
The Franklin at Crossroads is an apartment community located in Wake County and the 27606 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Wake County attendance zone.
<a href="https://www.thefranklinatcrossroads.com/?ilm=costar" title="View Property Website" rel="nofollow noopener" class="js-externalUrl baseAlignedIcon propertyWebsiteLink" target=_blank>
<button class="actionLinks js-viewAllHours" role="button" aria-label="expand all hours" aria-expanded="false">

Restrictions: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home with a monthly pet rent of $20 per pet. Pet fee is $350 per pet. Please call for complete pet policy information.

No weight limit. Breed restrictions apply.

Restrictions: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home with a monthly pet rent of $20 per pet. Pet fee is $350 per pet. Please call for complete pet policy information.

No weight limit. Breed restrictions apply.
Garage rental rates are $100 per month. Additional Interior Storage Closets available at $25-35 per month. Please call our leasing office for complete parking and additional storage information.
<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/dir//6010+Attleboro+Dr+Raleigh+NC+27606" class="showBingDirectionsLink js-showBingDirectionsLink" title="Directions" rel="nofollow noopener" target=_blank>

Residents living in the Cary Crossroads/Apex area enjoy its beautiful weather, celebrated public school system, and a thriving economy that offers careers with some of the world’s leading medical and technology companies.

From shopping malls like Beaver Creek Crossings to parks filled with sprawling oaks and plentiful entertainment, this neighborhood has it all. Residents get to enjoy the urban setting of Downtown Raleigh as well as natural landscaping. Locals are just minutes from major highways like U.S. Highway 64. There’s tons of local amenities and attractions in Cary Crossroads/Apex not far from your apartment.
It should come to no surprise at all why this neighborhood often tops the list of best places in the country to live and work.
Learn More About Cary Crossroads/Apex
<!-- Add profile v2 collegecard and schoolcards -->
<div class="profilev2College js-viewAnalyticsSection tabContent active" id="profilev2College" data-analytics-name="points_of_interest">
The Franklin at Crossroads is within 11 minutes or 5.3 miles from NC State, Centennial Campus. It is also near NC State and Meredith College.
Dillard Drive Elementary
Dillard Drive Middle
Athens Drive High
Raleigh Sda School
GRACE Christian School
Adventist Christian Academy of Raleigh
<i class="storyicon infoStoryIcon mortar-tooltip-icon" role="button" aria-label="more information">

The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

Transportation options available in Raleigh include Cary Station, located 4.6 miles from The Franklin at Crossroads. The Franklin at Crossroads is near Raleigh-Durham International, located 13.1 miles or 20 minutes away.
This area is considered a car-dependent area and most errands will require a car.
You might be able to find places to ride your bike in this area, but you’ll most likely want your car for most errands.
Score provided by
Score provided by
Time and distance from The Franklin at Crossroads.
The Franklin at Crossroads has 3 shopping centers within 1.0 miles, which is about a 19-minute walk. The miles and minutes will be for the farthest away property.
Swift Creek Bluffs Nature Preserve
Stevens Nature Center at Hemlock Bluffs
Historic Yates Mill County Park
The Franklin at Crossroads has 5 parks within 4.8 miles, including Lake Johnson Nature Park, Swift Creek Bluffs Nature Preserve, and Stevens Nature Center at Hemlock Bluffs.
The Franklin at Crossroads is 61.2 miles from Fort Bragg Johnsonville, and is convenient to other military bases, including Pope Air Force Base.
Property Ratings at The Franklin at Crossroads
How Is This Rating Determined?

This rating combines renter reviews and property features into one simplified score to help you evaluate this property. Factors that influenced these ratings include building design, construction, exterior spaces, and amenities.
Share details of your own experience with this property

Apartment is nice but they have big issues with package deliveries

My packages keep going missing from mail room. This is the 3rd time. I have picture evidences that USPS delivered my packages but someone is stealing them from mail room. Management office is not doing anything about this. They are just like “How it be”. I would either not order anything online while living in here or I wouldn’t move in here at all.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hello, we regret to hear that your experience with us was not a more positive one, however we did personally reach out to you with a resolution to your package issue. Additionally, your visit to the office yesterday was the first time we have heard of any issue regarding missing packages from you. We have asked that you provide us with the picture evidence so that we can further look into this utilizing our camera system but we have yet to receive this information. Thanks again for taking the time to leave us this information about your recent visit. Take care!

Overall, the experience at Franklin has been good. Lots of dedication to the grounds, parking is plentiful, units are nice and the location is great. Management is friendly but not really responsive to resident issues.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hi there, your satisfaction is our top priority. We are happy to hear that you have overall enjoyed your experience including your apartment and the community itself. The team at The Franklin takes all resident issues seriously and handles them in a courteous and prompt manner. If you feel that your issue was not resolved, then please reach out to the Community Manager at 919.854.0606. Thanks again for taking the time to leave us this information about your stay. Take care!
The Franklin is a clean and well maintained living   environment, I have suggested it to friends and relatives.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hi, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations! Our maintenance team strives to ensure that The Franklin is clean and maintained for our residents. Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!

I moved in two weeks ago and so far I am loving everything about living at The Franklin!  The office staff and maintenance staff are very friendly and very helpful!  Also, the location is absolutely the best around, because we are just a two minute drive from multiple stores, multiple restaurants and just about anything needed is a short drive away!
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hi, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at The Franklin at Crossroads Apartments! We are thrilled that you love your new apartment and the location. The Franklin is certainly convenient to Crossroads shopping and restaurants. We all enjoy having such a great variety as well. Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!
This is a high-quality rental complex, with strong security, many facilities and elegant apartments.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hello there, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback. We are thrilled that you are enjoying all that The Franklin has to offer. We sincerely thank you for the positive review, and look forward to seeing you again soon!
The community is nice and the people are friendly. I'm enjoying my stay.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hello, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! We are so glad to hear that you have been enjoying the community and your stay. Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!

The apartment community is in a convenient area and I admire the effort of tenant engagement through coffee and food events. In addition, removal of the geese was one of the best changes I've seen since residing within the community.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hi, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at The Franklin at Crossroads Apartments! We are thrilled that you are enjoying the events. We actually have another one coming up on April 2nd and will have an event for Easter, as well. Be sure to follow us on social media for the details. We utilized Geese Chasers in order to humanely chase the geese off the property. We agree that it is much nicer to walk around the community without the excess waste on the sidewalks. We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

We love the Franklin community. We have lived here almost 6 years. Love the spacious property, beauty from our windows, spacious apartment, hallways are so pleasant, and we always love coming home. We have looked at other communities through the 6 years wondering if we should buy a home or condo, but the condos are SMALLER than our 3-br apartment and VERY overpriced, plus HOAs are exorbitant! Many apartment communities are crowded with buildings feel stacked on top of one another, we feel boxed in, and toxic-fume garagessome with apartments stacked on top. We come home to The Franklin and just love the open property, clubhouse, fountain, parking lots, indoor mail room, elevators, and our spacious, pretty apartment.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at The Franklin at Crossroads Apartments. We're happy we could meet your expectations! We are excited to hear that you are loving your apartment and continue to renew with us. Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!
We made a great choice in selecting The Franklin as our first home in North Carolina. Modern unit, quality amenities, nice property and ample parking. We love it here!
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hello, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at The Franklin at Crossroads Apartments. We are so glad that you are loving it here and are happy with your home. If you ever need anything from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

I love living here! The management staff truly cares about the residents and seek to do what is best for all. They are always open to any concerns. Great communication, which is so important when you are dealing with the public.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at The Franklin at Crossroads. We're happy we could meet your expectations! We appreciate your kind feedback.

This place is appealing at first.  The leasing agent is very friendly and professional with good working knowledge. But once we moved in, there were some things we couldn't deal with, mainly the AC units above. I should be allowed to move out.  Transfer to another apartment was out of my budget range. I really had i hopes about this apartment, now I'm very disappointed and angry because I lost hard earned money and unable to help my roommate with her immediate need, like a quiet place to stay.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Good Afternoon. Thank you for taking the time to write this review; we truly appreciate the feedback! Our residents' happiness is extremely important to us and we would love to have the opportunity to discuss your concerns further! Please contact the office at (919) 854-0606 or email us at thefranklin@greystar.com. We are happy to help in any way we can!

Everyone should order replacement of HVAC air filters periodically, practicing social distancing and wearing masks to minimize exposure to COVID-19. Clogged air filters have led to high humidity and mold.  Those conditions can cause serious health problems.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hi, we're excited to hear that you found our staff to be so supportive during your experience here at The Franklin at Crossroads and that the Maintenance Team was able to address your service request promptly! Our Team is always happy to conduct maintenance requests when submitted online through the resident portal or called into the Office. Our Maintenance Team responds within 24 hours during normal business hours, and we have a 24/7 Emergency On-Call Service readily available after-hours and on weekends through our call service line. Since COVID-19 started, we have been taking extra measures with our maintenance requests with social distancing and the requirement of all team members to wear face coverings, and were able to still address service issues as they were called in. We're so glad that when you brought your service issues to our attention, we were able to immediately address those concerns, and earn your 5-star rating! We hope to continue this 5-star service and continue to make your living experience an exceptional one. If you need anything else, please do not hesitate contacting us so we can address any concerns you may have.
The staff at The Franklin are polite, professional, responsive, and competent -- a pleasure to work with.  Maintenance team is exceptionally good and prompt.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hello, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! We strive to provide exceptional customer service as a team here and it makes our day to hear that our residents are enjoying their time here in every way! Thanks again and have a wonderful weekend!
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review
Hello! Thank you for this review - we are so glad to hear you are enjoying it here! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you. Have a great week!
Apartments are lovely! Wonderful place to live!
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review
Hello, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! We are so glad you like the apartments and have had a great experience with us! We hope you have a great day!

Management can't handle tenants; noise complaints every other day, young crowd, parties every other night - disturbing quality of life and ability to get enough rest, curtsy officer files official complaints to the leasing office as well - nothing happens. They just do not care. Be very vary of moving here.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hi there! We are so sorry to hear you have had a bad experience. I assure you we are eager to help in any way we can! Our 24/7 Courtesy Officer is on call to address noise complaints in person when the office is closed and unavailable to help. We want everyone to enjoy their stay with us and would love the opportunity to work with you directly to help improve the remainder of your stay! Please feel free to contact us with these and any other concerns and we will do our absolute best to find a solution for all parties!

Accommodation, amenities and professionalism.  Thomas and Ashley get the job done.  Ask the questions and they will give you the answer or research your question.  As a new resident no question is too small.My husband and I wanted to down size and find the right community for us.  We were looking for a great location, safety, ample apartment space, a garage, storage, and a walking area within our community, excellent amenities.  It is a community that you can be a part of at your choice.  We made the right choice for our new beginning.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Hi there! Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review! We are so lucky to have Thomas and Ashley on our team - they want to make this the best stay possible for you! It's always good to hear that residents are happy with the location of the apartments, safety, apartment size, storage options, and the surrounding area! We love that we are so close to the Crossroads Plaza as well as many restaurants! We are so glad that you have chosen us as your new beginning and we hope to make it last! Have a great day!

The apartments are nice, but don't count on being able to use the grills. We usually have to walk back to our apartment frustrated because they never work or are too disgusting to put actual food on. I'd say look for a more responsive management before you pick this place.
The whole complex is clean and makes us feel very safe. The apartment life team has gone above and beyond to make it a great experience. There are plenty of events and food trucks. Love living here
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review
Wow, we're glad you had such a wonderful experience with us!

Very noisy, worst apartment noise-wise I’ve ever lived in. Can hear exact conversations from other apartments- very poor construct and insulation. While I realize that shared living spaces will have some noise, many loud and noises parties going on well after midnight even during the week. Contacted management several times about noise complaints with no resolution. Frustrating experience, would recommend looking elsewhere.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Thank you for your feedback, we are sorry to hear about the experience you have had with us so far. We'd love the opportunity to work with you to help make it right. Please feel free to stop by the office any time, or email us so that we can go over options that could help improve your stay. We also have great news in regards to the after hours noise issues you have experienced. We are in the process of hiring an on-site courtesy officer. Each resident will have their contact information so that when we are not in the office to help address noise, there is still someone on-site to help. We look forward to helping the remainder of your stay be a positive one.
A wonderful place to call home. I feel like I live in a fancy five star resort sometimes.
It's simply a great place to live.

My experience at the Franklin has been top notch! We have wonderful neighbors and community, excellent staff, and luxury style amenities that are well maintained. I would highly recommend making The Franklin your new home!
Love the enclosed hallways and mail room! Pretty lobby & foyer. Amy D.
Modern apartments and amenities in a super-convenient location
This apartment community is simply beautiful and it is peacefully quiet.
You will immediately get a sense of where the cost goes when you move in. I've never felt more comfortable in a new place before.

The Franklin at the Crossroads is a wonderful development with an amazing community. The staff is knowledgeable and professional and has made our move an easy one. I highly recommend this community to anyone looking for a quiet, upscale apartment life.
When looking for an apartment, these issues were crucial:  security and comfort.  The Franklin met those requirements.

I just moved into my apartment and I am so pleased with everything! The finishes of the apartment are to die for. The location is very convient to lots of shopping and entertainment. And I CAN NOT forget Joshua! He is so awesome and so accomodating. I am really going to enjoy it here.
Lovely place to live, great service, clean environment, well kept.
This is not an Apartment to me, this is my home. The Franklin is a great place to have the freedom of apartment home living in a first class property.
The staff is super friendly and the elevators made move in so easy! The community is beautiful, modern, and everyone is so nice I love it!
We have moved to the Franklin Apartments a few weeks ago and we are very happy with our choice. There are three aspects which makes it very pleasant for us:
We are in minutes from the Crossroads commercial areas, with stores like BJ, Best Buy, Lowes Foods, Home Depo, Office Depo and many others.
There are a many of good quality restaurants, including Olive Garden, Red Lobster and many others.
We are close to the intersection of Route 40 with Route 440, 64, Route 1. Easy to get on the highway for any trip.
Due to my job, I have traveled a lot all over the world and I can compare the comfort and quality of Franklin Apartments with some of the best hotels where I stayed.
All our service requests (such as change of garage, installing a fan, etc.) got a quick response and perfect execution in the shortest time.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

We can't thank you enough for this glowing review! The proximity to shopping, restaurants, and major highways is one of our favorite things about The Franklin as well. Our service team and office staff are dedicated to handling work requests with speed, accuracy, and a smile! Thank you for choosing The Franklin as your new home! We hope to continue exceeding your expectations for years to come.

The Franklin is a WONDERFUL place to live! The units are spacious and newly built!  No need to spend money on a gym membership.. there is a large gym with everything you need!  Also a very welcoming clubhouse (conference room, computers, pool table, big screen TV, yoga classes), beautiful pool area with grills, weekly social events and it is conveniently located to everything you need!  They also have a Car Care Kit on site which I personal had to use to jumpstart my vehicle!  The most important and best quality that The Franklin delivers is their amazing customer service.. I honestly cannot say enough GREAT about this place!!
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Thank you so much for your feedback on The Franklin! We are so glad that you have enjoyed our generous on-site amenities, fabulous location, and unique conveniences like the 'Jumpstart Kit'. Our priority is to provide exceptional customer service and we couldn't be happier to hear that we've succeeded in your eyes! Thank you for being a valued member of our Franklin Family!
The Franklin Apartment at Crossroads Apartments

A great place to call “home.”  The entire staff always greet you with a smile and are very helpful to our needs, and are quick to attend to any problems that arise.  The grounds and facilities are kept clean every day by friendly courteous workers.  The workout rooms are open 24/7 and are rarely crowed.  The pool area is absolutely beautiful. It is quiet and a great place to enjoy reading a book and relaxing. Everyone here is so friendly. I have met many friends of all ages here. I love the convenience of the elevator. I love the fact that they have locked storage in the hall.... I have a rolling clothes cart that I use to put my seasonal clothes on... it works great! You can store many items in that closet....tall ceilings too. The apartments have great modern features which I love. I feel very safe here. The parking lot is well lit. I love the fact that they have so many extra parking spaces when you have visitors.  Great shopping and restaurants nearby. A perfect place for any age group. I’m retired and 64..... I feel so at home here.
Property Manager at The Franklin at Crossroads, Responded To This Review

Thank you so much for your 5-star review! We love the added convenience of the temperature-controlled storage units and the excess parking as well. It is our main goal to make The Franklin a wonderful, comfortable place to live and we thank you for affirming our efforts!

Within 50 Miles of The Franklin at Crossroads
Which floor plans are available and what are the price ranges?
This property has one bedroom to three bedrooms starting at $1,508/mo. to $2,321/mo.
Can I see a model or take a tour of the property?
Yes, you are able to take virtual tour for this property on Apartments.com.
What neighborhood is the property located in?

The Franklin at Crossroads is located in Cary Crossroads/Apex in the city of Raleigh. Here you’ll find three shopping centers within 1.0 mile. There are also five parks within 4.8 miles, including Lake Johnson Nature Park, Swift Creek Bluffs Nature Preserve, and Stevens Nature Center at Hemlock Bluffs.

What Are Walk Score®, Transit Score®, and Bike Score® Ratings?
Walk Score® measures the walkability of any address. Transit Score® measures access to public transit. Bike Score® measures the bikeability of any address.
What is a Sound Score Rating?
A Sound Score Rating aggregates noise caused by vehicle traffic, airplane traffic and local sources
